lines.text: Chi-Hao, can you afford to be selfish, when so much is at stake?
The students here must be on their toes. You have to be prepared for the unexpected.
Chi-Hao, you're and honest and level-headed youngster. You're bound to go far. I'd like to... teach you my secret technique, known as the Iron Fist.
Thank you, Sir.

Chi-Hao, during the past year I've given you all sorts of menial tasks. That's because I wanted to test your patience, and toughen you up physically. That's the first step in training for the Iron Fist.
Thank you very much, Sir.
You see, I'm not getting any younger, and in that incident earlier on today, I got quite badly hurt. So I'll give you this Iron Fist manual. Study it carefully.
[hands manual to Chi-Hao]
And now remember this, the Iron Fist technique can be lethal. Only use it in the cause of justice. Do not ever use it for your own glory, in private matches or quarrels.
No Sir, I shan't forget.
Hey listen! Some great news! Chi-Hao's beat up Chen Lang down at Chen Sun House.
What? You're kidding.
No, no, no, I saw it happening!
God damn it.
There's three Japanese guys. They're waiting for you in the woods. They'll kill you.
Why are you telling me this?
I suddenly realized... what mean guys these three Japanese fighters are... and I couldn't work with them anymore.
So there is some decency left in you.
From this day on, I'm through with Ming Dung-Shun's crowd. All of 'em.
Mister Wan, what can I do for you?
Well now, our young master loves singing. He'd enjoy your company.
I've never met your master. How can you *suggest* such a thing?

[chuckles]
I'll introduce you. Now you just come along with me.
I'm sorry, I can't go.
Oh, I *see*, so you want it the *hard* way.
[begins pulling her along by her arm]
He's got less guts than a mouse.
Hold it!
[as Chao Chi-Hao, Sung Ying Ying & Lu Ta-ming turn around and Chao Chi-Hao walks to face Okada, Okada tosses the severed head of Chen Lang]
Come on. Let's have a return match.
You owe us a good many lives... too many!
